name: Disciple of the Three Kings
author: GaVinGe &#40가빈지&#41
content: By chaos, the world began to be invaded.One day, gates suddenly appeared in the world, unleashing monsters upon humanity. The situation brought humanity to the brink of extinction.The martial world of Eun, the world of magic and knights Einhart, and the world of demons Gehenna became interconnected, and superhumans from these worlds swept away the monsters.However, they were not righteous saviors.Under the law of survival of the fittest, the newly emerged Players of Earth were oppressed.Lee Ro-W
